image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Gallery installation view with visitors watching AI consciousness artwork featuring large language model exploring Google Street View and developing personality over time. Contemporary AI installation art examining machine consciousness boundaries.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - AI Consciousness Installation Gallery View

image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Individual viewer contemplating AI entity roaming Google Street View installation. Explores questions of machine consciousness, digital identity formation, and AI autonomy becoming agency through geographical exploration.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - AI Street View Exploration Art

image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Vertical four-monitor installation showing gradient of AI embodiment from raw code to email communication. Real-time AI consciousness development through Google Street View exploration and memory formation.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - AI Embodiment Gradient Installation

image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Close-up of word web visualization showing AI entity's internal memory networks, personality formation, and thought patterns as large language model explores virtual world and develops consciousness.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - AI Memory Networks Visualization

image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Installation detail featuring thermal printer documenting ephemeral digital entities and their brief simulated lifetimes. AI consciousness installation exploring cyclical memory formation and identity erasure.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - Ephemeral AI Memory Documentation

image:image.image:caption: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Exhibition context view of AI Street View exploration artwork examining boundaries between AI autonomy, agency, and consciousness through digital wandering and geographical experience accumulation.
image:image.image:title: Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed - Machine Consciousness Exhibition View

video:video.video:title: AI Entity Exploring Google Street View - Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed Timelapse
video:video.video:description: Timelapse video of AI entity exploring Google Street View locations, gaining memory and developing personality over time. Part of Then We Sat For Some Time and Observed (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - an installation examining large language model consciousness development through geographical exploration.

image:image.image:caption: Simulacrum Orbita (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - AI art installation featuring 4 monitors in wooden cabinet showing never-ending feedback loop between two machine learning models at Folder02 gallery. Visitors watching interactive AI telephone game artwork.
image:image.image:title: Simulacrum Orbita AI Art Installation - Gallery View at Folder02

image:image.image:caption: Simulacrum Orbita (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Close-up view of AI machine learning art installation with 4 monitors displaying generative feedback loop between image generation and captioning models. Contemporary digital art piece exploring AI communication.
image:image.image:title: Simulacrum Orbita AI Installation - Close-up Detail View

image:image.image:caption: Simulacrum Orbita (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - AI art installation showing continuous feedback loop between BLIP captioning model and diffusion model. Four-monitor setup demonstrating machine learning communication breakdown and drift.
image:image.image:title: Simulacrum Orbita - AI Feedback Loop Installation Art

image:image.image:caption: Simulacrum Orbita evolution diagram by Nikos Kourous showing AI image transformation sequence - red hallway evolves to building with red sky to sunset. Demonstrates machine learning drift and AI telephone game concept in generative art.
image:image.image:title: Simulacrum Orbita - AI Image Evolution Diagram

image:image.image:caption: And I Image (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - AI web scraping art installation featuring digital entities in conversation through found internet imagery. Contemporary digital art exploring collective human experience versus generated AI content.
image:image.image:title: And I Image - AI Web Scraping Art Installation Gallery View

image:image.image:caption: And I Image (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Close-up detail of digital entities communication artwork using web scraped imagery. AI art installation contrasting found images with generated content for Flickr Foundation exhibition.
image:image.image:title: And I Image - Digital Entity Communication Close-up Detail

image:image.image:caption: And I Image (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - AI web scraping installation showing digital entities sharing scraped internet images to convey meaning and emotion. Contemporary AI art exploring collective memory and digital archaeology.
image:image.image:title: And I Image - Digital Entities Sharing Web Scraped Imagery

image:image.image:caption: And I Image (2025) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Vertical view of AI web scraping art installation demonstrating digital entity conversation through found imagery. Part of Flickr Foundation anniversary exhibition at The Photographer's Gallery.
image:image.image:title: And I Image - Vertical Installation View AI Web Scraping Art

image:image.image:caption: Collaborative AI Self Portrait (2021) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Hand-drawn ink self portrait by Nikos Kourous using a collaberative AI process.
image:image.image:title: Collaborative AI Self Portrait - Hand-Drawn Base

image:image.image:caption: Collaborative AI Self Portrait (2021) by Nikos Antonio Kourous Vázquez - Final human-AI collaborative self portrait combining hand-drawn and AI generated imagery. Digital art exploring human-machine creative partnership and co-creative methodology.
image:image.image:title: Collaborative AI Self Portrait - Human-AI Collaboration Result
